Excellent for tapas...right next to the sensational "Market" - Mercat de Santa Caterina.  You can sit outside, at the bar (lots of seating) or in the well decorated restaurant.  The decor is unique and beautiful. The restaurant serves all fresh food from the market and the menu is rather different...with a ton of different tapas offerings (and some truly amazing olives, pickles and salmon appetizers).  Great food and wine selection.  Staff speak multiple languages and are friendly and helpful. The market and restaurant were renovated into a very modern design - great architecture.  Worth a visit.
